titleStmt.title: The English improver improved, or, The svrvey of hvsbandry svrveyed discovering the improueableness of all lands some to be under a double and treble, others under a five or six fould, and many under a tenn fould, yea, some under a twenty fould improvement / by Walter Blith ... ; all clearely demonstrated from principles of reason, ingenuity, and late but most real experiences and held forth at an inconsiderable charge to the profits accrewing thereby, under six peeces of improvement ...
titleStmt.author: Blith, Walter, fl. 1649.

titleStmt.title: The English improver improved, or, The svrvey of hvsbandry svrveyed discovering the improueableness of all lands some to be under a double and treble, others under a five or six fould, and many under a tenn fould, yea, some under a twenty fould improvement / by Walter Blith ... ; all clearely demonstrated from principles of reason, ingenuity, and late but most real experiences and held forth at an inconsiderable charge to the profits accrewing thereby, under six peeces of improvement ...
titleStmt.author: Blith, Walter, fl. 1649.

editionStmt.edition: The third impression much augmented ; with an additionall discovery of the severall tooles, and instruments in their formes and figures promised, with a second part, containing six newer peeces of improvement ...

biblFull.extent: [25], 274, [12] p., 1 folded leaf of plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: First published 1649 under title: The English improver, or, A new survey of husbandry.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
